description.value: You're always sneaking unless you choose to be seen, even when there's nowhere to hide. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] even without cover or being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed]. When you employ an exploration tactic other than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Avoid Notice]{Avoiding Notice}, you also gain the benefits of Avoiding Notice unless you choose not to.
